MOUNTAIN SNOW 2 (night version)

An environmental background for CHAOS
(c)'99 by SPA (spa@planetquake.com)

If you use this environment then be sure to use the following path:
..\QUAKE2\CHAOS\ENV

Please don't use this background in combination with maps for other Quake2 modifcations than CHAOS!

Don't found the background for you next CHAOS map you are looking for? Mail me! =)

SPA 
spa@planetquake.com
www.planetquake.com/chaotic
